verses.verse: In the blood from the cross I have been washed from sin; But to be free from dross, Still I would enter in.
verses.refrain: Deeper yet, deeper yet, Into the crimson flood; Deeper yet, deeper yet, Under the precious blood.
verses.verse: Day by day, hour by hour, Blessings are sent to me; But for more of His power Ever my prayer shall be.
Now I have peace, sweet peace, While in this world of sin; But to pray I'll not cease Till I am pure within.
